mapper.select: select case when user_id = #{userID} then 'true' else 'false' end as is_registered ,count(1) as registered_count from event_registration where event_id = #{eventID}
select event_id from event where club_id = #{club_id}

select a.event_id ,a.club_id ,a.end_time ,a.event_address ,a.event_name ,a.event_status ,coalesce(a.fee,0.0) as fee ,a.form_item ,concat('/pic.htmls?p=',coalesce(a.image,'')) as image ,coalesce(a.max_people,0) as max_people ,coalesce(a.min_people,0) as min_people ,a.organizer_id ,a.register_end_time ,a.register_start_time ,a.start_time ,a.view_guests from event a where
a.event_id = #{event_id} and
a.club_id = #{club_id} and
a.event_status = 1 or (a.event_status = 2 and a.end_time > now())

select d.* from ( select COUNT(1) as sum_member ,a.event_id as event_id from event a left join event_registration b on a.event_id = b.event_id where a.event_status = 1 and
a.register_start_time < now()
and
a.register_end_time > NOW()
GROUP BY a.event_id ) c LEFT JOIN event d on d.event_id = c.event_id where
c.sum_member < d.max_people
or coalesce(d.max_people,0) = 0 ORDER BY d.start_time desc
